get.description: Return all Workspaces that the current API token has access to.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The amount of results to return. The maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The amount of results to return. The maximum is 1000.

get.description: Return all Costs for a CostReport.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: First date you would like to filter costs from. ISO 8601 formatted.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Last date you would like to filter costs to. ISO 8601 formatted.

parameters.name: groupings
parameters.description: Group the results by specific field(s). Defaults to provider, service, account_id. Valid groupings: account_id, billing_account_id, cost_category, cost_subcategory, provider, service, tag:<tag_value>, region, resource_id. If providing multiple groupings, join as comma separated values: groupings=provider,service,region

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Whether to order costs by date in an ascending or descending manner.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The amount of results to return. The maximum is 1000.

get.description: This is a health check endpoint that can be used to determine Vantage API healthiness. It will return 200 if everything is running smoothly.

200.description: This is a health check endpoint that can be used to determine Vantage API healthiness. It will return 200 if everything is running smoothly.

parent_folder_token.description: The token of the parent Folder.

workspace_token.description: The token of the Workspace to add the Folder to. Ignored if 'parent_folder_token' is set. Required if the API token is associated with multiple Workspaces.

parent_folder_token.description: The token for the parent Folder, if any.

created_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the Folder was created. ISO 8601 Formatted.

updated_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the Folder was last updated at. ISO 8601 Formatted.

workspace_token.description: The token for the Workspace the Folder is a part of.

parent_folder_token.description: The token of the parent Folder.

workplace_token.description: The Workplace to associate the SavedFilter with. Required if the API token is associated with multiple Workspaces.

filter.description: The filter query language to apply to the SavedFilter, which subsequently gets applied to a CostReport.

cost_report_tokens.description: The tokens for any CostReports the SavedFilter is applied to.

filter.description: The SavedFilter's filter, applied to any relevant CostReports.

created_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the report was created. ISO 8601 Formatted.

created_by.description: The User who created the SavedFilter.

workspace_token.description: The token for the Workspace the SavedFilter is a part of.

filter.description: The filter query language to apply to the SavedFilter, which subsequently gets applied to a CostReport.

workspace_token.description: The token of the Workspace to add the Cost Report to. Ignored if 'folder_token' is set. Required if the API token is associated with multiple Workspaces.

filter.description: The filter query language to apply to the CostReport.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens of the SavedFilters to apply to the CostReport.

folder_token.description: The token of the Folder to add the CostReport to. Determines the Workplace the report is assigned to.
The token for the Folder the CostReport is a part of.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens for the SavedFilters assigned to the CostReport.

filter.description: The filter applied to the CostReport.

created_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the report was created. ISO 8601 Formatted.

workspace_token.description: The token for the Workspace the CostReport is a part of.

filter.description: The filter query language to apply to the CostReport.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens of the SavedFilters to apply to the CostReport.

folder_token.description: The token of the Folder to add the CostReport to. Determines the Workplace the report is assigned to.

widget_tokens.description: The tokens of the widgets to add to the Dashboard. Currently only supports CostReport tokens.

date_bin.description: Determines how to group costs in the Dashboard.

date_interval.description: Determines the date range in the Dashboard. Incompatible with 'start_date' and 'end_date' parameters.

start_date.description: The start date for the date range for costs in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Incompatible with 'date_interval' parameter.

end_date.description: The end date for the date range for costs in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Incompatible with 'date_interval' parameter.

workspace_token.description: The token of the Workspace to add the Dashboard to. Required if the API token is associated with multiple Workspaces.

widget_tokens.description: The tokens of the widgets displayed in the Dashboard. Currently only supports CostReport tokens.

date_bin.description: Determines how to group costs in the Dashboard.

date_interval.description: Determines the date range in the Dashboard. Guaranteed to be set to 'custom' if 'start_date' and 'end_date' are set.

start_date.description: The start date for the date range for CostReports in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Overwrites 'date_interval' if set.

end_date.description: The end date for the date range for CostReports in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Overwrites 'date_interval' if set.

created_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the Dashboard was created. ISO 8601 Formatted.

updated_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the Dashboard was created. ISO 8601 Formatted.

workspace_token.description: The token for the Workspace the Dashboard is a part of.

widget_tokens.description: The tokens of the widgets to add to the Dashboard. Currently only supports CostReport tokens.

date_bin.description: Determines how to group costs in the Dashboard.

date_interval.description: Determines the date range in the Dashboard. Incompatible with 'start_date' and 'end_date' parameters.

start_date.description: The start date for the date range for costs in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Incompatible with 'date_interval' parameter.

end_date.description: The end date for the date range for costs in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Incompatible with 'date_interval' parameter.

total_cost.description: The sum of all costs for the CostReport for the requested period, rounded to 2 decimal places, alongside the ISO 4217 currency code.
